channel.title: Advertisements
channel.description: I am getting really annoyed at all these fucking retarded RPG advertisements. For instance, "Rohan" online has an advertisement with an armored female with part of her ass hanging out. And yet, I cannot forget, the biggest fail on the net, Evony. Im surprised someone hasnt sued there gold farmer asses yet. If you looked back at the old ads, if you go on the most secured - serious business websites, you can ATLEAST see 1 partially-nude girl on their site. Ridiculous. Someone needs to do something about these advertisements sooner or later.

item.title: Advertisements

item.description:
@SJT wrote:

[quote=“asyo4, post:10, topic:347308”][quote author=ChaosPkers link=topic=443683.msg3257952#msg3257952 date=1278273182]
are you gay? why are you complaining about half naked girls?
[/quote]
Are you a fucking pedophile? Why are you complaining that you’re still a virgin?

Lets not get this topic out of hand, so let’s just get back on topic.[/quote]

wink wink wink lol

Read full topic

item.title: Advertisements
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

When I see them I think crap, because every(most) game advertisements are that way, its a bore now. To be honest if all you go to games for is fucking big tits, the redtube is a better site for that, and also I meant “On most sites” not the site sorry.(yes I know there on the sides sometimes too)

Read full topic

item.title: Advertisements
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:4, topic:347308”]I know what he means, he means the banners at the bottom and top of the screens on the site-.-[/quote]no, he means the advertisements in GENERAL. Not just on here. If he was complaining about the advertisements on here he would have complained about it being on here. Even if he did intend to direct them toward ads on moparscape, these shitty ads are all over the place. Nearly all of them have you thinking tits.

Read full topic

item.title: Advertisements
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:2, topic:347308”]Awwwwwwww so instead of just ignoring them you make a topic for them, you really must like them![/quote]He’s not complaining about the advertisements being on here, but the cheap marketing RPG makers throw at us. You can’t deny that Evony is the worst in marketing scams. Half of their advertisements lead you to believe there’s porn in their game.

Read full topic
